statements: SELECT * FROM citizenship_approvals_and_denials WHERE approval_status = 'approved';
SELECT citizen_id, denial_reason FROM citizenship_approvals_and_denials WHERE approval_status = 'denied';
SELECT approval_date, approval_status FROM citizenship_approvals_and_denials WHERE citizen_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM citizenship_approvals_and_denials ORDER BY approval_date DESC;
SELECT approval_notes FROM citizenship_approvals_and_denials WHERE denial_reason LIKE '%missing documents%';
SELECT * FROM citizenship_approvals_and_denials WHERE approval_status = 'approved' ORDER BY approval_date DESC;
SELECT citizen_id, approval_date, denial_reason FROM citizenship_approvals_and_denials WHERE denial_reason IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM citizenship_approvals_and_denials WHERE approval_status = 'denied' ORDER BY citizen_id;
SELECT citizen_id, approval_status FROM citizenship_approvals_and_denials WHERE approval_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT citizen_id, approval_notes FROM citizenship_approvals_and_denials WHERE LENGTH(approval_notes) > 50;
SELECT * FROM citizenship_approvals;
SELECT citizen_name, approval_date FROM citizenship_approvals ORDER BY approval_date DESC;
SELECT denial_reason, denial_date FROM citizenship_denials WHERE denial_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT approval_date, citizen_name, approval_reason FROM citizenship_approvals WHERE citizen_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM citizenship_approvals WHERE approval_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM citizenship_approvals WHERE approval_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY approval_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT citizen_name, approval_reason FROM citizenship_approvals WHERE approval_reason LIKE '%pending%' ORDER BY approval_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM citizenship_denials WHERE denial_reason IS NOT NULL ORDER BY denial_date DESC LIMIT 5 OFFSET 3;
SELECT denial_id, denial_date, citizen_name FROM citizenship_denials WHERE denial_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01' ORDER BY denial_id ASC;
SELECT citizen_name, denial_reason FROM citizenship_denials WHERE denial_reason LIKE '%insufficient documents%' ORDER BY denial_date DESC LIMIT 3 OFFSET 2;
SELECT * FROM citizenship_approvals;
SELECT applicant_name, approval_date FROM citizenship_approvals WHERE approval_status='Approved';
SELECT denial_reason FROM citizenship_denials WHERE denial_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_id, event_date, event_type FROM citizenship_history ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT applicant_name FROM citizenship_approvals WHERE approval_date >= '2021-07-01' AND approval_status='Pending';
SELECT approval_id, applicant_name, approval_date, approval_status FROM citizenship_approvals WHERE approval_status = 'Approved';
SELECT event_id, event_date, event_description, event_type FROM citizenship_history ORDER BY event_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT denial_id, applicant_name, denial_date, denial_reason FROM citizenship_denials WHERE denial_reason LIKE '%document%';
SELECT * FROM citizenship_approvals WHERE approval_date >= '2022-01-01' AND approval_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT applicant_name, approval_date FROM citizenship_approvals WHERE approval_status = 'Approved' ORDER BY approval_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM citizenship_approvals;
SELECT applicant_name, approval_date FROM citizenship_approvals ORDER BY approval_date DESC;
SELECT applicant_name, denial_reason FROM citizenship_denials WHERE denial_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT applicant_name, status FROM citizenship_status WHERE status = 'Pending' ORDER BY status_date;
SELECT id, applicant_name, approval_count, denial_count FROM citizenship_analytics WHERE approval_count > 5;
SELECT * FROM citizenship_approvals WHERE approval_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY approval_date DESC;
SELECT applicant_name, approval_reason FROM citizenship_denials WHERE denial_date <= '2022-06-30' ORDER BY denial_date ASC;
SELECT applicant_name, status FROM citizenship_status WHERE status = 'Pending' AND status_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT approval_count, denial_count FROM citizenship_analytics WHERE applicant_name = 'John Doe' OR applicant_name = 'Jane Smith';
SELECT * FROM citizenship_approvals UNION SELECT * FROM citizenship_denials ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM citizenship_approvals;
SELECT applicant_name, approval_date FROM citizenship_approvals WHERE approval_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM denial_reasons ORDER BY reason_code DESC;
SELECT applicant_name, denial_date, denial_reason FROM citizenship_denials WHERE applicant_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT event_date, event_type, event_description FROM citizenship_history WHERE event_type = 'Approval' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM citizenship_approvals ORDER BY approval_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT applicant_name, approval_date FROM citizenship_approvals WHERE approval_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_approvals FROM citizenship_approvals;
SELECT applicant_name, approval_reason FROM citizenship_approvals WHERE approval_reason LIKE '%positive%';
SELECT * FROM citizenship_approvals WHERE applicant_name = 'John Doe';
